3 5 53 Plot
   This function writes to a file numerical data
tabulating  function(s). The name of file is defined 
by the user. After that  the user gets menu which 
provides an option  to write down files in  PAW, 
GLUPLOT and ROOT formats which reads  the data file 
  The data file can be used to reproduce the 
plot by the command:
    $CALCHEP/bin/plot_view  dataFile 
  PAW/GNUPLOT/ROOT files can be launched by 
corresponding graphical  system. See next level
menu for details.
